_comment: Hyperliquid Autonomous Trading Bot Configuration - OPTIMIZED FOR LEVERAGE

mode._note_paper: LIVE TRADING ENABLED - Real money on the line!
mode._note_autonomous: When true, bot executes without approval

risk_management._note_position: Percentage of account balance per trade (1-5% recommended)
risk_management._note_sl: Stop loss percentage from entry (2-5% recommended)
risk_management._note_tp: Take profit percentage from entry (6-12% recommended)
risk_management._note_daily: Stop trading if daily loss exceeds this amount
risk_management._note_consec: Pause after this many losses in a row
risk_management._note_dd: Pause if account value drops this much from peak

signal_generation._note_conf: Only trade signals with confidence >= this (60-80 recommended)

1h._note: 10x leverage: 0.5% stop = 5% loss, 1.0% target = 10% profit on margin

4h._note: 8x leverage: 1.0% stop = 8% loss, 2.0% target = 16% profit on margin

1d._note: 7x leverage: 1.5% stop = 10.5% loss, 3.0% target = 21% profit on margin

safety._note_emergency: Set to true to halt all trading immediately
safety._note_slippage: Cancel orders if slippage exceeds this
safety._note_rate: Delay between API calls to avoid rate limits
safety._note_health: How often to check API connectivity

trading._note_reduce: Ensure exit orders only close positions

advanced._note_trailing: Use trailing stops instead of fixed (experimental)
advanced._note_partial: Take partial profits at intermediate levels (experimental)
advanced._note_vol: Adjust position size based on market volatility
